_header: O blessed maid mother and wife
Subjects: Virgin Mary, prayers to; prayers, to Virgin Mary
_description: James Ryman, an orison to the Virgin Mary — five quatrains (aaab) with refrain, ‘Ora pro nobis dominum’ and burden: ‘Cum sola sis spes hominum / Ora pro nobis dominum’

CULEe112.First Lines:
O blessid mayde moder and wyffeGraunter of pease seaser of
                    stryffe…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…Thatte heuyn blysse may be oure medeOra pro nobis
                        dominum
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 331-2.
Greene,  Richard Leighton. 
             The Early English Carols.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1935; 2nd ed., rev., Oxford: Clarendon,
            1977: 161-2; 1977, 143.
